Text: Remove the default map size limit of 256x256
Allow your normal game to be saved into maps. The buttons will appear in the top-left corner while you play the game. You can also upload that map to the Steam Workshop. NOT in Map Editor.

When saving a map, revert the buildings to their original locked state. You may have unlocked them while creating the map. If you do not check this, the buildings will remain unlocked for players starting a new game.
